price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߘߋ߲ߞߍ߫ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߒߠߋ ߓߟߏ߫ ߘߌ߬ ߗߍ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߡߊ߰ ߒ ߠߊ߫ ߸ ߒ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߖߊߕߐ߫ ߘߌ߫؟
arabic: قَالَتۡ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِي بَشَرٞ وَلَمۡ أَكُ بَغِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālat annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun walam yamsasnī basharun walam aku baghiyyan
